original_text:
To my shame, I must say, we were too weak for that!
But whatever anyone else dares to boast of—I am speaking as a fool—I also dare to boast of that.
korean_text: 나는 우리가 약한 것 같이 욕되게 말하노라 그러나 누가 무슨 일에 담대하면 어리석은 말이나마 나도 담대하리라

sentences.original_text: we were too weak for that!
But whatever anyone else dares to boast of—
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다른 사람들이 감히 자랑하는 무엇이든—

sentences.original_text: I am speaking as a fool—
I also dare to boast of that.
sentences.korean_translation: 나도 그것을 감히 자랑할 수 있습니다.
